channel.title: Parallelism on Simon Willshire
channel.description: Recent content in Parallelism on Simon Willshire

item.title: Efficient Parallelism
item.description:
Original Course Paper (2015)

This paper was written for a distributed computer course (COIS-4350H) in 2015. It analyses the Parallela architecture using ARM and it’s MIMD coprocessor (Epiphany).

  • Efficient Parallelism (PDF)

item.title: Linear Genetic Programming
item.description:
Original Course Paper (2014)

This paper was written for an artificial intelligence course (COIS-4550H) in 2014. It examines a self-programming program using genetic algorithm techniques (with a fitness evaluation).

  • Linear Genetic Programming (PDF)
